author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FOR A PORTION OF THE STATE OF MICHOACAN...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FOR A PORTION OF THE STATE OF MICHOACAN... As of 12:00 PM CST Fri Sep 12 the center of Mario was located near 17.4, -102.8 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FOR A PORTION OF THE STATE OF MICHOACAN... As of 12:00 PM CST Fri Sep 12 the center of Mario was located near 17.4, -102.8 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Mario (EP3/EP132025)
